channel.title: More Hearts of Wulin on Twitch
channel.description:
![07-PM|690x234](upload://KXd8CeTwyc5wHZ6DemBzEXFw4N.jpeg) For those of you who watch Twitch Broadcasts, this Monday at 8PM Eastern I will be starting a monthly *Hearts of Wulin* campaign on [twitch.tv/arvaneleron ](https://t.co/kaZ1m34W4v). We did a one-shot during the KS campaign and that was well-received. My hope is to use this as an opportunity to advocate for the Gauntlet, storygames, and safety tools. I've given them some of our Gauntlet icons, so it should be prominently co-branded (we'll see).
I also need to give another shout out to @Mathias who was the first to stream HoW on Twitch!
This is author Gregory Wilson's channel. He's taking care of set up and all the technical side. He has a KS going on right now: https://t.co/R1dhIwXI4z
